content.title: Clean Code
content.subtitle: A Handbook of Agile Software Craftsmanship
content.description: Looks at the principles and clean code, includes case studies showcasing the practices of writing clean code, and contains a list of heuristics and "smells" accumulated from the process of writing clean code.

content.title: The Clean Coder
content.subtitle: A Code of Conduct for Professional Programmers
content.description: Presents practical advice on the disciplines, techniques, tools, and practices of computer programming and how to approach software development with a sense of pride, honor, and self-respect.
